scripts.dev: pnpm run serve:development & run-p -sr dev:shopify dev:watch
scripts.build: pnpm run serve:production && rollup -c --environment NODE_ENV:production && pnpm serve:production
scripts.serve:development: pnpm replace-in-files --regex="\{%- assign asset_suffix = '.*' -%\}" --replacement="{%- assign asset_suffix = '.dev' -%}" layout/theme.liquid
scripts.serve:production: pnpm replace-in-files --regex="\{%- assign asset_suffix = '.*' -%\}" --replacement="{%- assign asset_suffix = '' -%}" layout/theme.liquid
scripts.preview: npm run build && shopify theme push -u --store $npm_package_config_store
